alert.note: Alert for Benton; Iowa (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:57PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Iowa and Benton Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 557 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near La Porte City to near Traer. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Garrison around 610 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Vinton, Keystone, Van Horne, Luzerne, Shellsburg, Blairstown and Newhall. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
